title: Strengthening Patient Care Competencies: Comparative Educational Program on Computer- and Manikin-Based Simulation Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can establish decision-making strategies to achieve a patient survival rate of over 40% in computer-based simulations
Learners can apply three or more core clinical judgment skills during manikin-based simulations
Learners can explain differences in educational effectiveness by comparing results from two simulation methods with 80% accuracy

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
